title.rendered: A two-way street: Mentoring opportunity turns into a learning one, says alumnus – for both of them.

content.rendered: An article published in Nexus Magazine on February 14, 2010 describes the on-going mentorship relationship between Harris Quach, a LAWS alumnus, and Eric Spindler, a partner of Blake, Cassels & Graydon LLP.
